summary: Implements the core Text‑to‑Speech (TTS) subsystem for Home Assistant, defining an abstract provider contract, managing audio generation and caching, exposing HTTP endpoints for on‑demand synthesis and URL retrieval, and handling services to speak text and clear cached files.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant to convert text into spoken audio using various TTS back‑ends, provide cached audio files for efficient reuse, and expose convenient services and web endpoints for automations, notifications, and user interactions.
